hero.title: Which team are you cheering for at AFCON 2025 in Morocco
hero.subtitle: Choose your team, Choose your package.

about.title: Dunia Safari Tours
about.description1: From stadium roars to desert stars, we specialize in curated experiences that celebrate both Africa's biggest sporting events and Morocco's timeless beauty.
about.description2: We deliver our DESTINATION's heartbeat, authentic moments, immersive culture, and memories no generic package can match.
about.trustedDescription: Vetted partners, licensed guides, WhatsApp check-ins, clear meeting points, and practical tips to smooth out the little frictions that make or break a trip.
about.budgetDescription: We design custom itineraries that feel premium without the price tag. You see the total cost upfront, no fluff!
about.curatedDescription: 3 Adventures (e.g. desert safari, waterfalls, Atlas mountains). 3 Slow moments (e.g. Berber village visit, sunset walks, hammam).

carousel.slide1Subtitle: Travel, celebrate, and make memories that last a lifetime.
carousel.slide2Subtitle: From Sahara dunes to Atlas peaks, adventure meets culture.
carousel.slide3Subtitle: Souks, lanterns, and flavors you'll never forget.
carousel.slide4Subtitle: Hike the Atlas mountains and explore Morocco's beauty.
carousel.joinWhatsApp: Join Our WhatsApp Community for updates

groupPerks.title: Group Travel Perks
groupPerks.subtitle: Why traveling with Dunia Safari groups enhances your experience
groupPerks.sharedDescription: Traveling as a group makes every moment richer — from cheering together at AFCON stadiums to bonding over desert sunsets and city adventures.
groupPerks.discountsDescription: Enjoy lower rates on flights, hotels, and experiences when you travel as part of a group.
groupPerks.hassleFreeDescription: We handle the logistics (flights, transfers, tours, tickets), so your group can simply relax and enjoy
